mdRecord.dcterms:title: Inventory of Personal Estate of John Augustine Washington, c. 1787
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Inventory of the personal estate of John Augustine Washington divided amongst his sons Bushrod Washington and Corbin Washington as indicated by the initials 'BW' and 'CW' in the columns next to the individually listed items. Items include firearms, personal items, furniture, tools, books (by title) and livestock. Autograph document, 2 pages.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Washington, John Augustine, 1736-1787 -- Estate
